## Data analysis ##

### Loading and exploring the Boston data ###

```{r}
library(MASS)
data("Boston")
str(Boston)
summary(Boston)
```


### Graphical overview and summary of variables ###

```{r}
library(corrplot)
cor_matrix<-cor(Boston)
corrplot(cor_matrix, type = "lower", method = "circle")
```
